description.value:
Baptism of Fire
Mystic Rite • Level 1

Time: 30 minutes
Cost: 1 Gnosis
Requirement: A newborn or newly discovered Garou

Description

The Baptism of Fire is the first sacred rite performed for a Garou, marking their entry into the spiritual order of Gaia. Through this Rite, the newborn is presented to the spirits, their nature acknowledged, and their path formally recognized.

This Rite does not grant power. It grants recognition.

Effect

When the Gnosis cost is paid, the Rite succeeds automatically.

Upon completion:

  • The Garou's Auspice is spiritually recognized
  • Spirits acknowledge the Garou as a legitimate child of Gaia
  • The Garou is no longer considered spiritually untested or unclaimed

This Rite has no immediate mechanical bonuses.

Long-Term Significance

The Baptism of Fire establishes the Garou's spiritual identity, which may influence:

  • How spirits react to the Garou
  • Eligibility for certain Rites, Fetishes, or spirit bargains
  • Narrative expectations tied to the Garou's Auspice

A Garou who has not undergone this Rite may be treated as: spiritually immature; unrecognized; or lacking proper standing (Storyteller adjudication).

Limitations

This Rite:

  • Does not grant abilities, features, or bonuses
  • Does not affect attributes, gifts, or advancement
  • Does not bind spirits or confer protection
  • The Rite may only be performed once per Garou

"You are known now. Walk the path that has opened before you."
